question: This state plans to observe September 22 as 'Rhino Day' to generate public awareness on the protection of the one-horned pachyderm.
explanation: The Assam government announced to observe September 22 as 'Rhino Day' to generate public awareness on the protection of the one-horned pachyderm. A State Rhino Project in line with National Rhino Project will be launched in Assam soon for protecting the pachyderms from threats of poaching.
